name: Associate / Intern to Data Analytics (Almaty)
description:
We are looking for a bright, talented fan of Analytics to join our Data Analytics team. Ideal candidate is the one who considers everything related to Data Analysis as his/her hobby and is ready to spend vast time on self-development and education.

Role and responsibilities

• Process and analyse various types of data
• Build dashboards in Tableau and Power BI

• Prepare infographics, presentations and technical assignments
• Readiness to participate on various types of advisory projects (non data analytics)

Knowledge and skills

• Higher education in Finance /Data Science
• Deep knowledge in statistics
• Advanced in Tableau or Power BI
• Advanced Excel skills: (Vlookup, Sumifs, Pivot Tables etc.)
• Proficiency in SQL, Python, VBA will be a great plus
• Fluent English (both speaking and writing)

• High GPA and additional certificates will be a plus
